participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Determined and resilient, he values discipline and camaraderie.
participant_1.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, she finds solace in her crafts and values connection with others.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: What do you feel about my person?
